source.description: Source path of the file or directory

name: create_directory
description: Create a new directory or ensure a directory exists.

path.description: Path of the directory to create

name: delete_file
description: Delete a file or directory from the file system.

path.description: Path to the file or directory to delete

recursive.description: Whether to recursively delete directories (default: false)

name: get_file_info
description: Retrieve detailed metadata about a file or directory.

path.description: Path to the file or directory

name: list_allowed_directories
description: Returns the list of directories that this server is allowed to access.

name: list_directory
description: Get a detailed listing of all files and directories in a specified path.

path.description: Path of the directory to list

name: modify_file
description: Update file by finding and replacing text. Provides a simple pattern matching interface without needing exact character positions.

all_occurrences.description: Replace all occurrences of the matching text (default: true)

find.description: Text to search for (exact match or regex pattern)

path.description: Path to the file to modify

regex.description: Treat the find pattern as a regular expression (default: false)

name: move_file
description: Move or rename files and directories.

source.description: Source path of the file or directory

name: read_file
description: Read the complete contents of a file from the file system.

path.description: Path to the file to read

name: read_multiple_files
description: Read the contents of multiple files in a single operation.

paths.description: List of file paths to read

name: search_files
description: Recursively search for files and directories matching a pattern.

pattern.description: Search pattern to match against file names

name: search_within_files
description: Search for text within file contents. Unlike search_files which only searches file names, this tool scans the actual contents of text files for matching substrings. Binary files are automatically excluded from the search. Reports file paths and line numbers where matches are found.

depth.description: Maximum directory depth to search (default: unlimited)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 1000)

path.description: Starting path for the search (must be a directory)

substring.description: Text to search for within file contents

name: tree
description: Returns a hierarchical JSON representation of a directory structure.

follow_symlinks.description: Whether to follow symbolic links (default: false)

path.description: Path of the directory to traverse

name: write_file
description: Create a new file or overwrite an existing file with new content.

content.description: Content to write to the file

path.description: Path where to write the file
